column5: I have purchased Klass Live Bait spinners in downtown Ear Falls the last few years and have had a lot of success. Anyone know if an online store sells them?
i think they are probably a little local supplier. you can make your own for about 1/2 what he charges.

They are not available on-line that I know. If you call them they will send you a catalog and/or sell them to you over the phone. (Check the packaging of your spinners for information.) I have not done this, but a friend of mine did it last year.
